Tokens that return no value (and instead revert or throw on failure) are also supported, non-reverting calls are assumed to be successful. To use this library you can add a `using SafeERC20 for IERC20;` statement to your contract, which allows you to call the safe operations as `token.safeTransfer(...)`, etc.","errors":{"SafeERC20FailedDecreaseAllowance(address,uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Indicates a failed `decreaseAllowance` request."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC20 token
